text: ane te samaya yada karavo jo'i'e jyare tamara palanahare e vata janavi didhi ke, te (allaha) yahudi'o para kayamata sudhi eka eva vyaktine jarura nakki kari dese je te'one sakhata saja apato rahese, ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara najika manja saja api de che ane kharekhara te ghano ja mapha karanara ane ghano ja dayavana che
